attributes.action: improve the living conditions that soldiers, airmen and sailors and their families live in
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The state of single and married accommodation for service personnel and their families is somewhat appalling and below standard and makes a mockery of human rights. Sign this petition to improve the standard of accommodation on all levels - would the council leave a family for over 10 days without heating or hot water no so why should our military personnel and their families who serve this country and make sacrifices be subjected to this

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
